'''''"Infinitesimal"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Eroding Avatar of Lava|text="Infinitesimal" &mdash; A Fiery Stone Gathers No Moss}} without getting hit by its Earthshaker Strike.
